CustomField.formula:
IF( TECH_Birthday_Date__c = TODAY(), IMAGE("/resource/iconics/images/cakered2.png","red"),
IF( AND(TECH_Birthday_Date__c - TODAY() <= 7, TECH_Birthday_Date__c - TODAY() > 0), IMAGE("/resource/iconics/images/cakeyellow2.png","yellow"),
IF( AND(TECH_Birthday_Date__c - TODAY() <= 14,TECH_Birthday_Date__c - TODAY() >7), IMAGE("/resource/iconics/images/cakegreen2.png","green"),
"")))
CustomField.label: Birthday Cake
